mapper.select:
select jan_new as jan,face,sku_rank,jan_rank, width, height
"${item1.zokuseiCol}"
"${item2}"
as "zokusei${item1.zokuseiId}"
from planocycle.work_priority_order_jan_new new inner join planocycle.work_priority_order_result_data resultdata on new.priority_order_cd= resultdata.priority_order_cd and new.jan_new = resultdata.jan_cd inner join ${proInfoTable} janinfo on janinfo."1"=new.jan_new inner join masterdb.jan_mst janmst on janmst.jan_cd = new.jan_new where resultdata.priority_order_cd=#{priorityOrderCd} order by sku_rank,jan_rank
